org.alma.obssm

Class Manager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.alma.obssm.Manager

  • public class Manager
extends Object
    This class manages all components, with the purpose of interconnecting objects between them. TO DO: Allow to launch a console mode operation.
    Version:
    0.3
    Author:
    Javier Fuentes
    See Also:
    StateMachineManager, LineReader, ObsSMPanel, Parser
